sub_title: LLM in International Law of Global Security, Peace and Development | Erasmus Mundus Scholar | Marketing Director @ LAWELS
summary:
I am an ambitious LLM candidate at Radboud University, specializing in International and European Law Advanced, as part of the Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree in International Law of Global Security Peace and Development. My journey has taken me through two other master's degrees at the University of Glasgow and Institut Barcelona d’Estudis Internacionals, where I explored the interplay between law, political science, international relations, economics, sustainability, human rights, migration, peacebuilding, security, and conflict resolution. 

Currently, I hold the position of Marketing Director at LAWELS, where I manage and execute digital marketing strategy. My role involves creating and distributing high-quality content across our website and social media channels, keenly following legal industry trends, and implementing real-time marketing strategies. I also coordinated various projects, such as the Academic Essay Project, which resulted in the publication of over 50 articles within six months and the successful launch of the first online legal journal of LAWELS. My ultimate goal is to leverage my marketing and legal skills to promote legal awareness and education among international audiences and to support the mission and vision of LAWELS.

Beyond my academic and professional pursuits, I am a firm believer in the power of diversity and cross-cultural experiences. Having lived, studied, and worked in different countries and cultures, I have developed a strong sense of intercultural communication and collaboration. I believe that my diverse perspectives and experiences can contribute significantly to any team, fostering innovation and creativity.

Thank you for visiting my profile, and I look forward to connecting with like-minded professionals to explore collaborative opportunities!
